channel.title: Abouts on Thiago Vacare
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Thiago Vacare

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Thiago Vacare, Software Engineer; I’ve been working mostly with Golang and Node.js in the last few years. I’m passionate about technology with a particular interest in the human side of software development. Studying code isn’t enough; you have to consider the people behind the software, too. I’m also interested in coding practices, system architecture, and infrastructure. I decided to create this blog to write about technologies; I needed a way to write about new things, whatever I discover, or I’m working.
